							            Treatment Options for Childhood CNS Germ Cell Tumors
							            
							                
							                    Newly Diagnosed CNS Germinomas
							                    Treatment of newly diagnosed central nervous system (CNS) germinomas may include the following:         -  Radiation therapy to the tumor and ventricles (fluid -filled spaces) of the brain. A higher dose of radiation is given to the tumor than the ar
